::: {.column-body}
## What is Post-Prediction Inference?

Post-Prediction Inference (PPI) constitutes an analytical paradigm for making accurate scientific inferences when someone would like to use a pre-trained machine learning algorithm to impute for missing values, while preserving the ability to perform valid statistical inference using those imputed values. 
:::
